title: some title
topic: Politics, Health, Sport or Tech, can be one or more of these
timestamp: A timestamp of the post-registration in the Piazza API
expirationTime: After the end of this time, the message will remain on the Piazza wall, but it will not accept any further actions, e.g. (likes, dislikes, or comments)

interactions.userEmail: some user email interacting with a post
